text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

name: MateVanKritiekZijnCodelijst_to_AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
title: MateVanKritiekZijnCodelijst to AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
description: Maps gender codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) AllergyIntolerance v3.3 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/AllergyIntolerance-v3.3(2020EN)) to <http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-criticality> as found in `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.severity` in FHIR R4.
